author: heinz.gassner
title: Onboard Latin-American Industry!
description: Growing Cardano's business-opportunities within Latin America's industry requires regional understanding and highly competent of local teams
solution: Utilizing the manufacturing-industry competence within our team, we will perform a thorough analysis of opportunities and associated hurdles
experience: More than 30 years of industry-leadership experience combined with Latin American team and direct access to industry-experts network
